metadata.name: [ BETA ] #000 .\\\ The Luminous Framework
metadata.description:
*Vibrant hues electrify the neurons, awakening oneself to the frequencies in the fields of life around us*


.\\\ CULT OF NEON  
A Tokenized, Physical Neon Art Collection  
created by @Lux_Capacitor


REDEEM FOR REAL, PHYSICAL NEON - [http://cultofneon.art]

---

.\\\ HOW IT WORKS

Each NFT can be redeemed ONCE for (1) real-life, glass neon artwork version at [http://cultofneon.art] - the "Neon Redeem Status" on the NFT shows if it has been redeemed yet. Once ordered, your NFT metadata will update to "Redeemed".

Once fabricated, we ship your neon to you - at that time, your NFT's artwork will also update to an animated version, fading between a studio photo of your neon & the original art - showcasing final product while preserving the original artwork.

*All fabrication & delivery costs (within Continental US) are included with NFT Price

---

!!! IMPORTANT

During the redemption process, you must not sell or list the NFT, or the fabrication will be halted.
